posts.post_content:
Price assumes a no-fee method.  PP Goods plus 3% is also fine.

Price includes shipping via Priority Mail and insurance.

The card is incredibly nice with the miscut being the only flaw.  The Lenox back is pretty much perfect.  Bought it from the most recent Love of the Game Auction:

$1815

Damn Luke, that is a stunner.

Mark
Thanks Mark.  Bump with a price drop.
I have to say, that is a truly gorgeous Lenox back. It presents marvelously. Best of luck with this card Luke. I know it is tough to replace one that appealing.
